title: firewall bug
body: is anyone else getting a firewall bug which disconnects you ingame and you cant reconnect? cause ive been getting it frequently and ive tried everything to fix it can anyone help?

replies.body: That's a very broad description. Could you tell me your OS, ISP and if this has happened to you at all before?
im using windows 7 and im with optus but its only recently started doing this. ive never had this sort of issue with league before
Have you made sure that you've gotten all available updates for Windows, including its security updates? Is this issue solely related to League?
its up to date for updates and it only happens to league i can run any of my other games perfectly fine

If you have any proxies or VPNs active, try turning them off and connecting again. I'm presuming you've already disabled all of your firewalls and anti-virus. If that fails, try [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq4). Remember to /flush dns and then reset.
